mapper.insert: /* Mapper - pay_success */ INSERT INTO SPONSER (SPONSER_INDEX, SPONSER_ADD, SPONSER_ADDNUM, SPONSER_P_METHOD, SPONSER_NAME, SPONSER_EMAIL, SPONSER_PHONE, SPONSER_MEMO, SPONSER_INVEST, US_INDEX, USACT_INDEX, SPONSER_P_CONFIRM) VALUES (99, #{sponser_add}, #{sponser_addnum}, #{sponser_p_method}, #{sponser_name}, #{sponser_email}, #{phone}, #{sponser_memo}, #{project_invest}, 32, 99, 'y')
